titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the City of Bowling Green, Kentucky, located in Warren County, can be proud of being a part of the history of the production of an American Icon, the Corvette, for 25 years.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/20/2006--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the City of Bowling Green, Kentucky, located in Warren County, can be proud of being a part of the history of the production of the Corvette for 25 years.
